text: Yana Chuku (Quechua yana black, chuku hat, "black hat", Hispanicized spelling Yanachuco) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru. It lies in the Huancavelica Region, Angaraes Province, Lircay District, and in the Huancavelica Province, Huachocolpa District.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Angaraes Province (Huancavelica Region) ==References== Category:Mountains of Huancavelica Region Category:Mountains of Peru
title: Yana Chuku
